text: Patrick "Pat" Finn (born July 31, 1965) is an American actor and comedian. He has had several recurring roles in television series, such as Murphy Brown and Ed. He played Santa Claus in Santa Paws 2: The Santa Pups. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Comedians from Illinois Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois
title: Pat Finn
